entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
